Articles.Content:
Crew shuttle "Space bus"

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/973S4)

I have removed all mod parts from the download.

This is useful for space station snacks runs, it works with FAR and stock revamp.

Features:

Eight Kerbal capacity

Aesthetically pleasing

Stock

RCS and docking port

Lights

No debris

High delta-v space bus(just the thing with the crew) delta-v: 1,652

Enjoy!

[Download](http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/Space-bus-release-version)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-13T17:17:53Z" title="08/13/2015 05:17  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 13, 2015</time> by Mad Rocket Scientist**
When I used it, all I could think of then was the theme to the magic school bus!

That's a Space TROLLEY!

THIS IS A SPACE BUS. (Made this almost two years ago.)

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/68462-The-Magic-Space-Bus](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/68462-The-Magic-Space-Bus)

Can't give any more rep right now. Good job!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-13T12:12:40Z" title="03/13/2015 12:12  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 13, 2015</time> by DuoDex**

Thanks for the rep!

Docked to a space station:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/22251-Showcase-SPACE-STATIONS%21-Post-your-pictures-here/page182](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/22251-Showcase-SPACE-STATIONS%21-Post-your-pictures-here/page182)
